name: @oino-ts/core
description: OINO TS library package for publishing an SQL database tables as a REST API.
author: Matias Kiviniemi (pragmatta)

scripts.build:js: tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && tsc -p ../bunsqlite/tsconfig.cjs.json  && tsc -p ../bunsqlite/tsconfig.esm.json && tsc -p ../postgresql/tsconfig.cjs.json && tsc -p ../postgresql/tsconfig.esm.json
scripts.build:all: bun run build:js && bun run build:types && bun run build:docs
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm --prefix ../bunsqlite version patch && npm --prefix ../postgresql version patch
